betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Instead of just using a biome-based modifier for nutrients and humidity, a crop will look for the tags of the biome it’s in and apply a modifier based on the number of “favoured” tags found in the biome.

Having the proper biome tags will provide a significant “nutrient” boost to your crops, resulting in a noticeable effect on growth speed. (+14 nutrient points per tag)
You can only benefit from up to 2 biome tags.
It is still possible to simulate up to 1 preferred biome tag by planting your crops in a high-humidity (80%+) location.
The bonus scales linearly with humidity between 50% and 80%.
Values below 50% will not provide any bonuses.
Values above 80% will cap the bonus at the equivalent of 1 preferred biome tag.
If any favoured biome tag is present in the current biome, the high humidity bonus will be ignored.
